title: Artist's portrait Seiji Kimoto
img_alt: Catalog Seiji Kimoto 1985-1995, Mia-Münster house St. Wendel
intro_text: St. Wendel City Museum Mia-Münster House in 1995 published an artist's portrait entitled "Seiji Kimoto, objects and drawings 1985 to 1995" with texts by Dr. Paul Bertemes of art agency mediArt and the director of Mia-Münster House, Drs. Cornelieke Lagerwaard.
